title: Mrbluntzy
author: Mrbluntzy
content: Does it mean we can directly print any thread and all the replies it contains? I came across a thread and I mistakenly clicked on "print" at the bottom of the thread, I was supprised to see something like this https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=printpage;topic=5446884.0

comments.author: dzungmobile
comments.body: Yes you can print it IF taht topic has less than 25 pages.This Printpage is desgined for "Show all for all posts in topics with less than 25 pages"For topics that are more than 25 pages, use that one https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5112444.0I noted it in Hidden pages / features on the forum

comments.author: FatFork
comments.body: Quote from: Mrbluntzy on March 31, 2023, 10:48:31 AMDoes it mean we can directly print any thread and all the replies it contains? Personally, I think it depends on the situation. If the discussion is public and not sensitive in nature, then I don't see anything wrong with printing it out for personal use. It can be helpful to have a physical copy of a discussion, especially if it contains valuable information that you may need to reference later.For example, I often print out threads related to my work, or research for a project, that I find particularly informative or useful. This helps me to have a record of the discussion that I can refer back to in the future, even if the thread is later deleted or becomes difficult to find online.

comments.author: cafter
comments.body: Quote from: dzungmobile on March 31, 2023, 11:22:45 AMYes you can print it IF taht topic has less than 25 pages.This Printpage is desgined for "Show all for all posts in topics with less than 25 pages"For topics that are more than 25 pages, use that one https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5112444.0I noted it in Hidden pages / features on the forumnot it's very easy than that: are you seeing that "All" button by clicking that you can also see all posts in a nice series or order.(but it has limit)and regarding print option,i use that option for : while reading the posts if a interesting thread comes front of my eyes, then i print that thread and save to read offline, when i will have very much free time, or you know that we see our favourite show or movie while eating, just like that if the thread was very good and i print it and read every word of that.
